head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ROSEN, LUCILLE GRULIOW

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ROSEN, LUCILLE GRULIOW

block.p: ROSEN-Lucille Gruliow. September 13, 2000, age 92. Artist and musician, loving wife of the late Leo, mother of Elizabeth Reiniger, Michael and Charles, grandmother of Nina Reiniger, Christopher Bergson, Julia, and Andrea, mother-in-law of Klaus Reiniger, Rachel, and Barbara Appelbaum and sister of Vera Galanter and the late Leo Gruliow. Memorial service Saturday, September 23, 2 pm at the New York Society for Ethical Culture, 2 W. 64th St. NY, NY Room 514. In lieu of flowers, please send donations to the charity of your choice.
